Makerspace




 
 Welcome to the Chico State Makerspace


Resized_20180216_145407 - Copy.jpeg

 



Current Status of the Makerspace: 
Due to limited staffing, use of the Makerspace is currently available by appointment only. If you would like to schedule an appointment, please use our Schedule Appointment button below and/or contact the Makerspace Coordinator by emailing  makerspace@csuchico.edu 
Schedule Appointment

 
Hours of Operation:
Open by-appointment.
Available Wednesday-Sunday from 12PM - 5PM.
About
Our Makerspace is a place where you can experiment, create, explore, and collaborate!
We offer a variety of tools and equipment, along with a team of student advisors dedicated to helping students and staff with designing and making their own creative projects.
 
Location
The Makerspace is located on the second floor of the Meriam Library, to the right of the Copy Center. 
 
Supplies
Through collaberation with Rapid graphics, button making and vinyl cutting supplies are sold right next door. See the Student Print Center website for their hours of operation. 
 
Contact Us
If you have any questions regarding the makerspace, feel free to email us at: makerspace@csuchico.edu.
 

 
 











 We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, the Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus.
 We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.
